card_name: Number C88: Gimmick Puppet Disaster Leo
card_text: 4 Level 9 monsters$NMust be Special Summoned with a "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell targeting "Number 88: Gimmick Puppet of Leo". Neither player can target this card on the field with card effects. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. During your End Phase, if your opponent's LP are 2000 or less, and this card has no materials, you win the Duel.
